duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute strategic networking plans to establish and grow sales opportunities within government agencies.
Negotiate and close sales with State, Local, and Federal Government agencies, serving as a trusted adviser to improve their operations.
Write proposals and respond to Request for Proposals (RFPs) to secure new business.
Provide follow-up training for new government agency customers to ensure successful implementation of solutions.
Manage sales pipeline and activity using sales management tools, and generate forecasting and tracking reports.
Stay up-to-date with new offerings and market trends through training and independent research.
Successfully complete motor vehicle report check as required for the role.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience.
Valid driver's license and eligibility to pass a Motor Vehicle Record check.
